section.title: Team favorites and tabs
section.hint: Mingle allows users to create favorites and tabs that have the same definition as existing favorite and tabs, e.g. same filter criteria, columns/lanes or view style. This will help users who want to rename their existing favorites or tabs to something else using the exact same definition.

subsection.title: Card view favorites
subsection.p: Favorites let you and your team quickly access a specific set of cards based on card properties and/or tags. Favorites also remember the type of card view at the time they are saved, i.e. grid, list or other view. Favorites can be made into tabs, allowing quick access from anywhere in Mingle.

section.subsection: Favorites and tabs can be created from pages, so that specific pages can be directly accessed from anywhere in Mingle.
